summary: Completed comprehensive navigation structure testing for Admin Dashboard. All navigation patch requirements successfully implemented and functional.
passed_tests: Backend API health check - All 25 endpoints working (100% success rate)
Sidebar navigation structure - Dashboard, Customer Relations (collapsible), Parts, Bodyshop, Mechanical, Insurance, HR, Customers all present
Customer Relations collapsible submenu - Today, Month View, Year View expand/collapse correctly
Dashboard top tabs navigation - All 8 tabs (Dashboard, Customer Relations, Parts, Bodyshop, Mechanical, Insurance, HR, Customers) present and functional
Coming Soon pages - Parts and HR tabs correctly navigate to Coming Soon pages with proper content
Admin section visibility - Settings and Users visible for CRM role as expected
New Appointment button - Present in dashboard top right and navigates correctly
Font implementation - NouvelR font properly applied throughout application
Theme compliance - White/Black/Grey color scheme maintained consistently
Navigation clickability - All sidebar navigation items are clickable and functional
Tab navigation functionality - Tabs navigate to correct pages (Coming Soon for unbuilt modules)
Customer Relations tab navigation - Correctly navigates to day view (/day)
Admin login authentication - Successfully logged in with admin/admin credentials
